desc: Mona Tawil Helmy is a San Antonio artist and a plastic manufacturing CEO who loves life, traveling, innovating, painting, and mentoring. Mona's work includes original abstracts, contemporary and fluid Paintings in addition to multi media art. Vivid colors and fun flow is characteristic of most of the work.

layout.text:
ARTIST
ARCHITECTURE DESIGNER
PLASTIC MANUFACTURER
LIFE LOVER
Based in San Antonio, TX
